mapper.delete: UPDATE category SET is_deleted = 'T' WHERE category_id = #{categoryId};
mapper.select: SELECT category_id, category_name FROM category WHERE parent_id IS NULL AND is_deleted = 'F';
select * from category where is_deleted = 'F' and category_id = #{categoryId};
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET category_name = #{category.categoryName}, parent_id = #{category.parentId}, update_time = NOW() WHERE category_id = #{category.categoryId};
